thread.title: Shaquille O'Neal dwarfs Simone Biles in Super Bowl LI pic
thread.title_full: Shaquille O'Neal dwarfs Simone Biles in Super Bowl LI pic | Daily Mail Online

author: Luke Augustus for MailOnline
title: Shaquille O'Neal dwarfs Simone Biles in Super Bowl LI pic
text:
They're two giants of their respective sports but standing side-by-side you wouldn't think that.
Ahead of Sunday's Super Bowl LI, between New England Patriots and Atlanta Falcons, two American champions posed for a photograph in Houston.
The names? NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal (7ft 1in) and four-time Olympic gymnast champion Simone Biles (4ft 9in).
Shaquille O'Neal (7ft 1in) dwarfed Simone Biles (4ft 9in) when they posed for a pic on Sunday
With a 2ft 4in difference between the pair - the photo stands out for more than the fact it's two standout stars in their sport.
Biles posted the picture via her Instagram account with the caption 'Hey Shaq' as they both raised a smile.
It was a look both have been wearing this weekend as they enjoyed Saturday in different ways.
O'Neal enjoys the UFC Fight Night event at the Toyota Center with his girlfriend Laticia Rolle
O'Neal also met UFC Women's Bantamweight champion Amanda Nunes (right)
O'Neal attended the UFC Fight Night event at the Toyota Center with his girlfriend Laticia Rolle.
The four-time NBA champion also bumped into UFC Women's Bantamweight champion Amanda Nunes, who was also watching the spectacle.
Meanwhile Biles attended this year's 2017 DIRECTV NOW Super Saturday Night Concert at Club Nomadic. She was seen there with fellow Olympic gymnast Aly Raisman and musician John Legend.
Biles posed for a photo alongside John Legend and Aly Raisman on Saturday night
